issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Document the missing command -removePolicy in HDFSErasureCoding.md and HDFSCommands.md and regroup the ec commands to improve the user experience.
fields.summary: Document the missing -removePolicy command of ec

comments.body:
GitHub user wenxinhe opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/249

    HDFS-12125. Document the missing -removePolicy command of ec.

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/wenxinhe/hadoop HDFS-12125.missing.removePolicy

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/249.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #249
    
----
commit 4db1763ea9068b6b02b6e9bb9822afa8b0c0d7d9
Author: wenxinhe <wenxin.he@gmail.com>
Date:   2017-07-12T04:06:09Z

    HDFS-12125. Document the missing -removePolicy command of ec.
    
    rename 'policyName' to 'policy'

commit d5af57e03f0290b6dbeceffff5f3bb3ae6f5ada3
Author: wenxinhe <wenxin.he@gmail.com>
Date:   2017-07-12T04:08:16Z

    HDFS-12125. Document the missing -removePolicy command of ec.
    
    document the missing -removePolicy command.

commit 6c81f6eeabd6aafe2d3859c8786abfea67dd322f
Author: wenxinhe <wenxin.he@gmail.com>
Date:   2017-07-13T02:51:33Z

    HDFS-12125. Document the missing -removePolicy command of ec.
    
    regroup the ec commands to improve the user experience.

----

001.patch:
# rename 'policyName' to 'policy'.
# document the missing -removePolicy command.
# regroup the ec commands to improve the user experience.

This message was automatically generated.

Now usage of ec commands looks like this after regroup: 

{noformat}
Usage: bin/hdfs ec [COMMAND]
          [-listPolicies]
          [-addPolicies -policyFile <file>]
          [-enablePolicy -policy <policy>]
          [-disablePolicy -policy <policy>]
          [-removePolicy -policy <policy>]
          [-getPolicy -path <path>]
          [-setPolicy -path <path> -policy <policy>]
          [-unsetPolicy -path <path>]
          [-listCodecs]
          [-help <command-name>]
{noformat}

I am not sure whether this order is OK. Any comment is welcome. Thanks in advance.
